name: Polar Pop Mania
description:
Cecilia the Seal needs YOUR help finding all her playful little pups that have ventured out all over the world! Toss and match colorful bubbles to save the seal babies and reunite them with their siblings!

From the icy arctic to mystical underwater ruins, explore this new game from the makers of Candy Blast Mania and Jewel Mania!

-100+ puzzles of match-3 gameplay and so many worlds to explore!
-POP your way around 19 unique and challenging obstacles!
-POWER up with Bubble Boosts to pop and drop your way to victory!
-EXPLORE a sparkling Tea Garden, the fantastical waters of Atlantis, and many more wonderful worlds!
-CHALLENGE your friends on the Leaderboards and become the puzzle master!
-FREE TO PLAY with FREE updates!

Polar Pop Mania is the coolest puzzle game on the iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, and best of all, it’s FREE!

Please note that Polar Pop Mania is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under “Allowed Content”. In addition, Polar Pop Mania may link to social media services such as Facebook, and Storm8 Studios will have access to your information through such services.
